## base64-image-convert 


CONVERT YOUR IMAGES TO BASE64 (big => jpeg & small => png)

https://www.base64-image.de/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_URI_scheme




https://select2.github.io/

https://github.com/select2/select2
